overview: SHADOW CUT is a portrait of the intimate relationship between thoughtful fifteen-year-old Boy and his best friend, Girl. Boy and Girl decide to take the long way home after school. When Girl senses Boy is hiding something, their romp around their small rural town soon exposes their dreams, fears and secrets. Ultimately they are left at a cross- roads, a late night decision that could change their lives forever.
tagline: Drawn to a world beyond the restrictive walls of rural New Zealand a young couple searches for truth, leading to a late night decision that could change their lives forever.
title: Shadow Cut
